channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Best of QVC Style
channel.desc: Catch all the recent highlights from our sister channel with the Best of QVC Style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Handbag Sale
channel.desc: Looking for a chic new handbag? You've come to the right place! Join us for a show jam-packed with brilliant prices on pieces from big-names brands like Kipling and lots more.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Summer Fashion Sale
channel.desc: A range of exciting and wearable fashions designed with comfort as well as style in mind - and all at not-to-be-missed prices.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Hayloft Plants
channel.desc: Discover an exciting range or rare, unusual, exciting, and most of all beautiful plants that will bring an abundance of charm and colour to your outdoor space.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 60% Garden Lighting
channel.desc: Up to 60% Garden Lighting.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: FitFlop Footwear
channel.desc: Discover FitFlop, which brings you a range of bio-mechanically engineered sandals, trainers and more that support you from the ground up, so you can feel comfortable and look great all day.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Garden Decor Deals
channel.desc: Dress up your garden in beautiful outdoor decor, all at amazing prices! Discover deals on outdoor lighting, decorations and more and transform your outdoor space into a haven.

channel.title: Marla Wynne Fashion Collection

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Home Improvements
channel.desc: Join us to discover a range of tools and ideas that will make it easy to improve and maintain your home. From high-quality DIY tools to top-notch cleaning equipment, find everything you need.
